document.full_text: israeli troops briefly detained about 100 women in the west bank early on thursday as part of an ongoing investigation into the murder last month of a young jewish settler family, locals said.
document.title: israel detains 100 women in murder investigation
lines_and_colors: israeli troops briefly detained about 100 women in the west bank early on thursday as part of an ongoing investigation into the murder last month of a young jewish settler family, locals said.
